text: Sarah Jacobson (August 25, 1971, Norwalk, Connecticut â€“ February 13, 2004 New York City) was an American independent filmmaker who wrote, produced, and filmed her own movies. She was known for her work Mary Jane's Not a Virgin Anymore. Jacobson died from endometrial cancer in New York City, aged 32. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Deaths from endometrial cancer Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:Writers from Connecticut Category:People from Norwalk, Connecticut
